types:type.name: userdetails
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type userdetails = Array<{| firstname: String, lastname: String, dob: String, email: String, phone: Number {"typeId": "double"}|}> {"example": "[{\\\"firstname\\\":\\\"deepan\\\",\\\"lastname\\\":\\\"s\\\",\\\"dob\\\":\\\"1998-09-25\\\",\\\"email\\\":\\\"deepan968@gmail.com\\\",\\\"phone\\\":9597778067}]"}

types:type.name: update
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type update = Array<{| id: Number {"typeId": "int"}, firstname: String, lastname: String, dob: String, email: String, phone: Number {"typeId": "double"}|}> {"example": "[{\\\"id\\\":1234,\\\"firstname\\\":\\\"deepan\\\",\\\"lastname\\\":\\\"s\\\",\\\"dob\\\":\\\"1998-09-25\\\",\\\"email\\\":\\\"deepan968@gmail.com\\\",\\\"phone\\\":9597778067}]"}

types:type.name: getinput
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type getinput = {| firstname: String, dob: String, email: String, phone: Number {"typeId": "double"} |} {"example": "{\\\"firstname\\\":\\\"deepan\\\",\\\"dob\\\":\\\"1998-09-25\\\",\\\"email\\\":\\\"deepan968@gmail.com\\\",\\\"phone\\\":9597778067}"}

types:type.name: postinput
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type postinput = Array<{| id: String, firstname: String, lastname: String, dob: String, email: String, phone: Number {"typeId": "double"}|}> {"example": "[{\\\"id\\\":\\\"1\\\",\\\"firstname\\\":\\\"deepan\\\",\\\"lastname\\\":\\\"s\\\",\\\"dob\\\":\\\"1998-09-25\\\",\\\"email\\\":\\\"deepan968@gmail.com\\\",\\\"phone\\\":9597778067}]"}
